snippet.title: Sonic the Hedgehog and Lightening Force: Quest for the Darkstar now on Nintendo Switch! | SEGA AGES
snippet.description:
SEGA AGES presents two new titles for the west!

Lightening Force: and Sonic the Hedgehog are now available on the Nintendo eShop for Nintendo Switch.

Keep an eye out as we announce more quality classic ports coming to Switch like Sonic the Hedgehog 2, Out Run, Space Harrier, Columns II and Thunder Force AC, and of course, Phantasy Star.
